addon_description.message: Alters some JS APIs to prevent fingerprinting.

optionsIntroduction.message: On this page you can adjust the settings of CanvasBlocker.

installNotice.message: CanvasBlocker was installed. If you want to be able to access this page in the future, please bookmark it.

updateNotice.message: CanvasBlocker was updated. If you want to be able to access this page in the future and have not bookmarked it yet, please bookmark it.

dontShowOptionsOnUpdate.message: Don't show up again after update.

displayDescriptions_description.message: Displays the descriptions of the settings.

displayHiddenSettings_description.message: Activate to display the hidden settings.

allowPDFCanvas_description.message: Firefox's native PDF reader uses the Canvas API to display PDF content. If too many ask dialogs appear or the PDF reader does not work at all, these have to be allowed.

askForInvisiblePermission.message: Do you want to allow invisible <canvas>?

askForInvisibleInputPermission.message: Do you want to allow invisible <canvas> input?

askForInvisibleReadoutPermission.message: Do you want to allow invisible <canvas> readout?

askForInputPermission.message: Do you want to allow <canvas> input?

askForReadoutPermission.message: Do you want to allow <canvas> readout?

askForVisiblePermission.message: Do you want to allow the red bordered <canvas>?

askForVisibleInputPermission.message: Do you want to allow input in the red bordered <canvas>?

askForVisibleReadoutPermission.message: Do you want to allow the readout of the red bordered <canvas>?

askForAudioPermission.message: Do you want to allow the audio API?

askForAudioInputPermission.message: Do you want to allow audio API input?

askForAudioReadoutPermission.message: Do you want to allow audio API readout?

askForHistoryPermission.message: Do you want to allow the history API?

askForHistoryInputPermission.message: Do you want to allow history API input?

askForHistoryReadoutPermission.message: Do you want to allow history API readout?

askForWindowPermission.message: Do you want to allow the window API?

askForWindowInputPermission.message: Do you want to allow window API input?

askForWindowReadoutPermission.message: Do you want to allow window API readout?

askForDOMRectPermission.message: Do you want to allow the DOMRect API?

askForDOMRectInputPermission.message: Do you want to allow DOMRect API input?

askForDOMRectReadoutPermission.message: Do you want to allow DOMRect API readout?

askOnlyOnce_description.message:
When CanvasBlocker's block mode is set to 'ask permission' or 'ask permission for readout API', a confirm message will appear every time a page tries to access the API or readout API. This setting tries to display the confirm message only once for each page regardless of how many times the page tries to access the API. Nevertheless, multiple confirm messages may still be displayed on some pages.

No: asking every time

Individual: each API-type (context, input, readout) has to be confirmed separately

combined: all API-types get confirmed together

askDenyMode_description.message: Which mode shall be used when the permission is denied.

showCanvasWhileAsking_description.message: Shows the content of the canvas for which the permission is asked for, if possible.

showCanvasWhileAsking_message.message: The webpage wants to read the content of the following canvas:

blackList_description.message: Domains or URLs where all APIs shall always be blocked. To add multiple entries, separate them by commas.

blockMode_urlSpecific.message: To set individual block modes for specific websites, click on the black arrow to open the menu, add the domain or URL by clicking on "+" and select the desired block mode.

minFakeSize_description.message:
Canvases with a smaller or equal area than this number will not be faked. This is a parameter to prevent detection.
CAUTION: This lowers the safety of the addon, therefore it is highly recommended not to set this value above 100.

maxFakeSize_description.message:
Canvases with a bigger area than this number will not be faked. (Enter zero to disable.) This is a performance parameter that can prevent browser freezes and should be adjusted to the computing power of the device.
CAUTION: This lowers the safety of the addon, therefore it is highly recommended not to set this value below 1 000 000.

rng_description.message:
none (completely white): a completely white image is returned. The option "Fake the alpha channel" should be activated with this. CAUTION: Do not use this with the "fake at input" mode.

non persistent: the random numbers will be determined freshly for each faking action.

constant: within one web page a color will always be faked to the same color.

persistent: the random number will only be determined once for every domain.

persistentRndStorage_description.message: Stores the data for the persistent random number generator for usage after restart.

storePersistentRnd_description.message: If data for the persistent random number generator shall be stored. Otherwise it is discarded on browser shutdown.

persistentRndClearInterval_title.message: Clear interval of the persistent data

persistentRndClearInterval_description.message: After the specified interval the persistent data is cleared automatically. (Enter zero to disable.)

clearPersistentRnd_description.message: Deletes all data for the persistent random number generator.

ignoreFrequentColors_description.message:
Number of colors that shall not be faked per canvas. This is a parameter to prevent detection.
CAUTION: This can reduce the performance of the addon because the color statistic has to be calculated for every image. Additional this can lower the safety of the addon, therefore it is highly recommended not to set this value above 3.

minColors_description.message:
Number of colors that a canvas must have to be faked.
CAUTION: This can lower the safety of the addon, therefore it is highly recommended not to set this value above 10.

fakeAlphaChannel_description.message: Activates the faking of the alpha channel (transparency).

useCanvasCache_description.message: Enables the canvas cache. This can prevent detection and increases the performance when small canvases are read several times, but decreases it for big canvases.

protectedAPIFeatures_description.message: List of protected API features. When unticking a checkbox, this feature of the API will not be protected.

preBlock.message: API blocked on {url} because CanvasBlocker settings were not loaded in time.

ignoreList_description.message: Domains or URLs where no notifications shall be shown. To add multiple entries, separate them by commas.

ignoredAPIs_description.message: No notifications will be displayed for the selected APIs.

selectIgnore.message: Select domain or URL to add to ignore list:

inputIgnore.message: Input domain or URL "RegExp" to add to ignore list:

inputIgnoreDomain.message: Input domain to add to ignore list:

inputIgnoreURL.message: Input URL "RegExp" to add to ignore list:

selectWhitelist.message: Select domain or URL to add to whitelist:

inputWhitelist.message: Input domain or URL "RegExp" to add to whitelist:

inputWhitelistDomain.message: Input domain to add to whitelist:

inputWhitelistURL.message: Input URL "RegExp" to add to whitelist:

selectSessionWhitelist.message: Select domain or URL to add to the session whitelist:

inputSessionWhitelist.message: Input domain or URL "RegExp" to add to the session whitelist:

inputSessionWhitelistDomain.message: Input domain to add to the session whitelist:

inputSessionWhitelistURL.message: Input URL "RegExp" to add to the session whitelist:

showNotifications_description.message: Show a notification when the block mode is set to "fake readout API".

showNotifications_urlSpecific.message: To deactivate notifications for specific websites, click on the black arrow to open the menu, add the domain or URL by clicking on "+" and remove its checkmark.

highlightPageAction_description.message: Highlight the page action icon for better visibility.

notificationDisplayTime_description.message: Number of seconds the notifications are shown. (Enter zero to disable automatic closing.)

stackList_description.message: JS files which are allowed to use all APIs. The input has to be in JSON format. Example: [{"url": "http://domain/file1.js"}, {"url": "http://domain/file2.js", "line": 1, "column": 4, "stackPosition": -3}]

whiteList_description.message: Domains or URLs which shall be allowed to use all APIs. To add multiple entries, separate them by commas.

sessionWhiteList_description.message: Domains or URLs which shall be allowed to use all APIs during the current session. To add multiple entries, separate them by commas.

storeNotificationData_title.message: Store detail data of the notifications

storeImageForInspection_description.message:
Enables the storage of the content of the faked canvas.
CAUTION: This may lead to a lot of memory consumption.

protectAudio_description.message: If the audio API shall be protected as well

protectAudio_urlSpecific.message: To exclude specific websites from this protection, click on the black arrow to open the menu, add the domain or URL by clicking on "+" and remove its checkmark.

audioFakeRate_description.message: How many of the values per read request shall be faked.

useAudioCache_description.message: Enables the audio cache. This can prevent detection but decreases the performance.

audioUseFixedIndices_description.message: If some of the used indices shall always be faked.

audioFixedIndices_description.message: The indices that are always faked. To add multiple entries, separate them by commas.

historyLengthThreshold_description.message: Maximal length of the history that is reported to the website.

protectWindow_description.message: window.opener and window.name will be protected. This can render some webpages unusable.

protectWindow_urlSpecific.message: To exclude specific websites from this protection, click on the black arrow to open the menu, add the domain or URL by clicking on "+" and remove its checkmark.

protectWindow_askReCaptchaException.message: Protecting the window API breaks reCAPTCHA. Do you want to add an exception for it?

protectDOMRect_description.message: This protects against the "getClientRects()" fingerprinting and several similar methods.

protectDOMRect_urlSpecific.message: To exclude specific websites from this protection, click on the black arrow to open the menu, add the domain or URL by clicking on "+" and remove its checkmark.

domRectIntegerFactor_description.message: Some fraction of a pixel can be controlled by CSS. To prevent detection, values of a DOMRect that multiplied with this factor are integers will not be altered.

blockDataURLs_description.message: Data URL pages cannot be protected against fingerprinting (see https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1475831). Blocking them prevents the real fingerprint to reach any server.

logLevel_description.message:
To find the cause of an error, detailed logging of the addon activities is helpful. This parameter controls the level of detail of the logging.

The logging can be viewed in the Browser Console (Ctrl+Shift+J) and the Web Console (Ctrl+Shift+K).

resetSettings_confirm.message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings?
